name: mindsphere-auth-helper
description: Siemens Insights Hub Authorization Helper (chrome extension). Siemens Insights Hub was previously known as MindSphere.

scripts.prepare: rimraf dist && tsc --outdir dist/ && cross-env cp -r assets/ dist/ &&  cp -r vendor/ dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp index.html dist/
scripts.pre-publish: cross-var "npm run prepare &&  rimraf *.zip  &&  7z a -tzip $npm_package_name-$npm_package_version.zip -w dist/."

author: @sn0wcat
